title: CoinCasso Official
author: CoinCasso Official
content: Especially for you, we are launching a new challenge!.Don't miss it: only the first 100 new users who complete all the tasks will receive a bonus of 10 USDT!What do you need to do to receive USDT for free?Learn more about the challenge: https://gleam.io/N3KOY/10usdt-on-coincasso-exchange

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: "This promo is not available in your Region" . That's what the website says.
